question: What is Hands App?
answer: Hands App is a community-driven platform designed to connect people in the UAE for mutual assistance, volunteer help, resource sharing, and helping other needs and get paid for that help. Hands interest in helping others by your resource / time and getting paid for that help. Our vision is to empower hands for all needs, one reliable platform, with multiple options such as urgent, today, scheduled help. Receive offer from other for your request for particular help, same time you can start earning by helping people by your choice.

question: How does Hands App work?
answer: Users can post requests for help or help in various areas such as errands, transportation, household tasks, and volunteering, pick up, drop off, collecting, buying and bringing back to end user, document collections, keys etc. your imagination is limit for help. The app facilitates connections between users based on their needs and offers or budget get the right help at right time.

question: What can I use Hands App for?
answer:
You can use Hands App to:
• Request help with daily tasks like grocery, shopping or transportation.
• Volunteer your time and skills for any help and initiatives.
• Share resources such as tools, books, and other items with your neighbors.
• Pick up and drop off, again you can find hands for all needs.
• Stay informed about local community help, your neighborhood help much more.

question: Is Hands App free to use?
answer: Yes, Hands App is free to download and use. There may be optional premium features or sponsored content available in the future.

question: How do I sign up for Hands App?
answer: You can sign up by downloading the Hands App from the App Store or Google Play Store, and then following the registration steps within the app.

question: Is my information secure on Hands App?
answer: Yes, we take your privacy and security seriously. Hands App uses encryption and follows best practices to protect your personal information. You can also control what information you share with others on the app.

question: How can I get involved in Hands to start earning by helping?
answer: To get involved as a patron, simply browse through the app explore page or become a patron option where you will register your ID proof such as resident or non-resident, once you complete all the set of questions just sit back and wait for your approval in app. Opportunities listed on the app. You can choose category that interest you and connect with the people who seek help and offer them your price for help get paid for it.

question: Can I offer services or products through Hands App?
answer: Yes, you can offer services, skills, or products through Hands App. Whether you're a professional offering a service or someone sharing items you no longer need, you can post your offers and connect with interested users.

question: How can I report a problem or provide feedback?
answer: If you encounter any issues with the app or have suggestions for improvement, you can reach out to our support team directly through the app's help section. We value your feedback and strive to continually improve the app based on user input.

question: Who can use Hands App?
answer: Hands App is designed for residents of the UAE who want to connect with their local community, by just helping every day and making money.

question: What types of assistance can I request or offer on Hands App?
answer:
You can ask help and offer various types of help, including
• Errands (e.g., grocery shopping, pharmacy pickups)
• Transportation (e.g., ridesharing, carpooling)
• Household tasks (e.g., gardening, pet care)
• Volunteering (e.g., community events, charity drives)
• Resource sharing (e.g., tools, books, household items)

question: How do I find help or offer assistance on Hands App?
answer: Simply create a post detailing on the home page by the options urgent, today, scheduled what you need help with or what you can offer. Users interested in your request or offer can then message you directly with an offer, accept the offer, pay for that offer, that’s it your help is on the way, and all the process through the app to coordinate further.

question: Can I trust the people using Hands App?
answer: Hands is safety, we verify all the users with their EID, passport, ID proof, every help order will be with OTP / Scan, all the accounts are custom verified by subject approval with multiple level.

question: Are there guidelines for using Hands App?
answer: Yes, Hands App has community guidelines to ensure a positive and respectful experience for all users. These guidelines cover behavior, content posting rules, and safety tips. Violations may result in account suspension or removal.

question: How can I delete my account or manage my privacy settings?
answer: You can manage your account settings, including privacy preferences and account deletion, within the app's settings menu. For assistance, you can also contact our support team through the app or email us at admin@handsappuae.com

question: Can businesses or organizations use Hands App?
answer: Currently the app is functional for individual only. But Yes, in future, businesses and organizations can participate in Hands App by offering services, sponsoring community events, or promoting volunteer opportunities. Contact us to explore partnership opportunities.

question: How does Hands App promote sustainability?
answer: Hands App promotes sustainability by encouraging resource sharing among community members. This reduces waste and promotes a culture of reuse and environmental responsibility, less resource spent, value for money, hands is local app where you find a solution for all daily needs.

question: How can I get updates and notifications from Hands App?
answer: Ensure your notification settings are enabled within the app to receive updates on new requests, offers, events, and app updates. You can customize these settings to suit your preferences.

question: How can I provide feedback or suggest new features for Hands App?
answer: We welcome your feedback and ideas for improving Hands App! You can submit feedback directly through the app's feedback or support section. Or write us an email at support@handsappuae.com. Your input helps us enhance the app for all users.

question: Is Hands App available in multiple languages?
answer: Currently, Hands App is available in English / Arabic. We are exploring options to introduce additional language support based on user demand and community feedback.

question: How Much I will earn if help others?
answer: Yes, based on the offer given to help you will be paid by detecting the service charge, portal fees, rest all will be added to your wallet to redeem, read the app clause and instruction provided in app to understand the terms & condition.

question: How can I trust the reviews and ratings on Hands App?
answer: Reviews and ratings on Hands App are submitted by users who have completed interactions are taken help with service proof. We encourage users to provide honest feedback based on their experiences to help build trust within the community.

question: What should I do if I encounter inappropriate content or behavior on Hands App?
answer: If you come across inappropriate content or behavior, please report it immediately using the app's reporting feature. Our team will review the report and take appropriate action to maintain a safe environment.

question: Can I advertise my business or services on Hands App?
answer: Currently the app is functional for individual only. But Yes, in future, businesses and organizations can participate in Hands App by offering services, sponsoring community events, or promoting volunteer opportunities. Contact us to explore partnership opportunities.

question: How does Hands App protect my personal information?
answer: Hands App follows strict privacy policies and uses encryption to protect your personal information. Your data is only shared with others as necessary to facilitate interactions and is not sold to third parties.

question: Can I use Hands App to fundraise for charitable causes?
answer: NO. Hands App primarily facilitates connections for assistance. Any funds involved or asking for money will be reported; Hands is for help, and your time or money earned.

question: Is Hands App available for download on all mobile devices?
answer: Hands App is available for download on both iOS and Android devices. You can find the app on the App Store for iOS devices and on Google Play for Android devices.

question: How can I contact support if I have further questions or issues?
answer: For additional assistance or inquiries, you can contact our support team through the Help or Contact Us section within the app. Our support team is ready to assist you with any questions or concerns you may have.

question: Can I use Hands App to connect with neighbors in my area?
answer: NO. Hands App facilitates connections with nearby users based on your location. You can post requests or offers for help; if any of their patrons are nearby with a good offer, they will accept and help. They can be your neighbor who is willing to help.

question: Are there age restrictions for using Hands App?
answer: Hands App is intended for users aged 14 and above. Younger users may use the app under parental guidance or supervision.

question: How can I share feedback about my experience using Hands App?
answer: We value your feedback! You can share your thoughts and suggestions on your order completion page directly through the app's feedback or support section. Your feedback helps us improve Hands App for all users.

question: Is there a limit to how often I can request or offer assistance on Hands App?
answer: There are no specific limits on how often you can use Hands App to request or offer assistance. Feel free to use the app based on your needs and availability to contribute to daily needs.

question: How does Hands App ensure fair and equitable exchanges between users?
answer: Hands App promotes a spirit of community and reciprocity among users. The offers are transparent to your needs; you can choose the offer you are interested in and proceed. This makes the app equitable.

question: Can I use Hands App when traveling outside of the UAE?
answer: Hands App is primarily designed for use within the UAE. Connectivity and availability of services may vary outside the designated service area. Consider exploring local resources or apps tailored for other regions during travel.

question: Can I delete my posts or offers on Hands App?
answer: Yes, you can manage your posts and offers within the app. Navigate to your post or offer, and you'll find options to edit or delete it as needed.

question: How can I build trust with other users on Hands App?
answer: Building trust on Hands App involves clear communication, timely responses, and fulfilling commitments. You can also rely on user reviews and ratings to gauge credibility.

question: What should I do if I encounter a user who is not responding or fulfilling their commitments?
answer: If you encounter issues with another user, you can reach out to them directly through the app's messaging feature to clarify expectations. If the issue persists, you can report the user to our support team for assistance.

question: Are there guidelines for posting requests or offers on Hands App?
answer: Yes, Hands App has guidelines to ensure posts are respectful, clear, and appropriate for the community. Avoid discriminatory language, sensitive topics, or illegal activities in your posts.

question: How can I update my profile information on Hands App?
answer: You can update your profile information, including your bio, profile picture, and contact details, in the app's settings or profile section. Keep your information accurate to facilitate smooth interactions with other users.

question: How does Hands App handle disputes between users?
answer: Hands App encourages users to resolve disputes amicably through direct communication. If assistance is needed, our support team is available to facilitate fair resolutions based on community guidelines and policies, and refunds are made on time.

question: Can I use Hands App to find educational or skill-building opportunities?
answer: While Hands App primarily connects users for assistance and community engagement, you may find educational or skill-building opportunities posted by users within the community who are interested in sharing knowledge.

question: How does Hands App ensure inclusivity and accessibility for all users?
answer: Hands App is committed to inclusivity and accessibility. We strive to provide a user-friendly interface, accommodate diverse needs, and promote a welcoming environment for all community members.

question: Where can I find more information about Hands App's mission and values?
answer: For more information about Hands App's mission, values, and community impact, visit our website or refer to the app's About section. We're dedicated to fostering connections and supporting local communities in the UAE.
